2010-11-01

Movember 2010: Favourite moustaches #1 Lemmy (of course)

This is my first shot at Movember - growing a 'tache and trying to raise money for prostate cancer - you can sponsor me over here - and remember that while the people in this series of photos may look incredibly cool but I will look most certainly not!

Lemmy and his face fungus... if Sammy Cahn had been writing his song in the 80s there certainly would have been a lyric about it in there. Incredibly, in a most bizarre turn of events Lemmy actually shaved it off for a while in the 90s... thankfully he saw the light and fixed everything shortly afterwards.
